abstract: Zoho Writer offers Internet word processing that can handle the basics and many advanced functions, without breaking a sweat.
snippet: Zoho Writer offers Internet word processing that can handle the basics and many advanced functions, without breaking a sweat.
lead_paragraph: WITHIN Microsoft’s Office group, the calendar on the wall appears to be 1983, the year the company introduced Microsoft Word. The company still expects customers to buy its software applications as products and install and run them on PCs.

headline.main: Small Company Offers Web-Based Competition for Microsoft Word
headline.print_headline: The Word Processor Is Looking at Home on the Web

abstract: Opposition to aspects of the Google books settlement has been building slowly in academic circles and beyond.
snippet: Opposition to aspects of the Google books settlement has been building slowly in academic circles and beyond.
lead_paragraph: Updated 10 a.m. Added reference to Consumer Watchdog.

headline.main: It’s Not Just Microsoft Balking at Google’s Book Plans
